troubleshooting.title: DITA Map WebHelp Transformation Fails (Duplicate Topic References Found)

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: DITA Map WebHelp transformation fails with a message that indicates duplicate topic references were found.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: By default the WebHelp transformation uses the force-unique parameter set to true to force the transformation to create unique output files for each instance of a resource when a map contains multiple references to a single topic. However, there are cases when this feature does not work as expected and the duplicate topic references are not handled properly.

steps-informal.p: To solve this issue, you should manually set a unique copy-to attribute on any duplicate topic reference that was not handled automatically by DITA-OT:<map> ... <topicref href="../topics/MyTopic.dita"/> ... <topicref href="../topics/MyTopic.dita" copy-to="../topics/MyTopic-2.dita"/> </map>
